name: Christian Hörauf
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: After being frustrated with C++, I got started into JavaScript and Functional Programming. I love TDD and looking forward for the next technology to turn my head around for 180 degrees.
what_can_i_contribute: I have a lot experiance with Angular1 and am currently introducing Angular2 to my company. I also know jasmine very well and developed mocking.js to simplify the generation and usage of mockdata.
